item.title: ICML 2023 Topological Deep Learning Challenge: Design and Results

item.description: Welcome to my website! My name is Manuel Lecha, and I am a first-year PhD student in Mathematics and Computer Science at the University of Barcelona. Under the guidance of Sergio Escalera, my research primarily focuses on artificial intelligence, geometry, and applied algebraic topology. Specifically, I am exploring learning over neural network spaces and its applications in 3D computer vision. I have a Master’s degree in Advanced Mathematics and Mathematical Engineering from the Polytechnic University of Catalonia.
